gameRatingDescriptionLong: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

i18n.longDescription:
The world is shattered. Monsters run rampant across a landscape broken into shards, and the only hope for the future lies in the Bastion, an ancient sanctuary that holds a secret to healing the land. The Bastion PC Download puts you in control of the Kid, a young man who believes the damage can be repaired and embarks upon an epic quest to set things right.

Travel across a vast fantasy landscape, from the broken City to the Wild Unknown. Find Cores and Shards to rebuild the Bastion and battle the sinister monsters who stand in your way. The further you go, the stronger you get, as you discover new weapons and gain experience to improve your skills. Purchase new equipment using Fragments at the Bastion and test it on exciting challenge courses.

 An action RPG with stunning anime-inspired visuals, the Bastion PC Download delivers a full and engaging story. Dynamic narration changes the tale depending on your actions, telling a different version of events every time you play. Download it to your PC today and dive into the Bastion universe.

 Features:

• Reactive Narrator: Bastion introduces a one-of-a-kind reactive narration system, which gradually reveals a rich back story as the narrator reacts to the player's actions, allowing for the player to have a truly personalized gameplay experience. The game features thousands of lines of narration. No player will be able to hear it all the first time through the game.

 • Lush, Hand-Painted World: Bastion is presented in a high-definition, richly-detailed painterly art style that enhances the fantastical world design and immerses players in a unique setting and atmosphere.

 • Nimble, Active Combat: The game offers exciting, highly responsive moment-to-moment action that rewards player skill and experimentation, allowing players to develop their own unique fighting styles by mixing and matching from a large variety of customizable weapons, each with their own special moves and mechanics.

 • Frequent Gameplay-Customizing Choices: Bastion features many customizable gameplay elements, including an array of weapons and upgrades and a special system that allows players to raise game difficulty in exchange for greater rewards.

 • Grand Adventure: This is a full-length experience offering eight to ten hours of fully narrated gameplay. Once players finish the journey, they unlock a "New Game Plus" mode, which introduces additional content and new ways to play.

i18n.shortDescription: A calamity has torn the world into pieces. Embark on an epic quest to put it back together with Bastion.
i18n.systemRequirements:
Operating system: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7
Processor: 1.7GHz Dual Core or Greater
Memory: 2GB
Hard disk space: 1.6Gb
Video: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card (shader model 2)
Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
DirectX®: 9.0c
